metadata.title: CVE-2016-5834 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the wp_get_attachment_linkfunction in wp-includes/post-template.php in WordPress before 4.5.3 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a craftedattachment name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5833.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
